subject: This line allows the SMTP link to be established as TCP port number 25 (the default value).
body:
He was evidently in a pessimistic mood.

WATCH OJU.F TRADE LIKE CRAZY!
THIS FRANKFURT STOCK IS
GOING THROUGH THE ROOF!

COMPANY: ORAMED PHARMA
SYMBOL: OJU.F
PRICE: 0.60
TARGET: 2.15
WKN : A0J3FG
ISIN : US68403P1049

WE ARE PREDICTING AMAZING
GAINS ON THIS ONE!
BE PART OF IT! ADD IT TO
YOUR PORTFOLIO!
WATCH OJU.F!!!

Alas, what thousand armed men of France Have writ that 
note of death in Audley's face.
